com.box.sdk

Class BoxAIDialogueEntry

  • Object
    • BoxJSONObject
      • BoxAIDialogueEntry

  • @BoxResourceType(value="file_version")
public class BoxAIDialogueEntry
extends BoxJSONObject
    Represents an entry of the history of prompts and answers previously passed to the LLM. This provides additional context to the LLM in generating the response.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
